name: GLAVNAYA
description:
Glavnaya is a 2D atmospheric platformer that evolves into a different gameplay as the character grows up.

Controls :

Press A or Left Arrow to go left .

Press S or Right Arrow to go right.

Press Space to Jump in the platformer stage.

Press 'E' to Interact with the world .

Quick tip on level 1 , use E on either the door or the treasure chest.
